item.title: Snippets from 'Here, There and Everywhere: My Life Recording the Music of The Beatles' by Geoff Emerick
item.description: I read this book looking for inspiration from one of my favorite bands and their recording engineer, Geoff Emerick. Emerick’s responsible for the cutting edge, fantastic engineering on some of my favorite Beatles records: Revolver, Sgt Pepper, and Abbey Road. I highly recommend the book. It was an insightful page turner. Here are a few snippets that stuck with me as I read. “It was because of those very limitations that we were put on the spot, forced to make creative decisions every step of the way.
